channel.title: Benton County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Benton County|Washington|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 North - Blue Bridge
item.description: Crossing the Blue Bridge over the Columbia River on US-395 north from Kennewick to Pasco Washington. Approaching left exit to Lewis St. Also approaching US-12 and I-182.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 113
item.description: I-82 west at Exit 113 - US-395 North/Jct I-182/Kennewick/Pasco. US-395 leaves I-82 westbound.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 114
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 114 - WA-397 North/Finley.

item.title: US-395 South at I-82
item.description: US-395 south at I-82 in Benton County. Use I-82 West for Yakima; I-82 East/US-395 South for Umatilla (OR) and Pendleton (OR). US-395 south joins I-82 east into Oregon.

item.title: US-395 South Approaching I-82
item.description: US-395 South approaching I-82. Use I-82 east for Portland (Oregon).

item.title: US-395 South - Kennewick
item.description: Entering Kennewick on US-395 south crossing the Columbia River on the Blue Bridge. Kennewick is one of the tri-cities of Washington, the other two being Pasco and Richland.

item.title: WA-240 West at WA-224 West
item.description: WA-240 West at WA-224 West to West Richland.

item.title: WA-240 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WA-240 west. Distance to West Richland and Vantage.

item.title: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West - Exits 4, 3A, and 3B
item.description: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West at Exit 4 - WA-240 West/Wellsian Way/Vantage. Approaching Exit 3B - Queensgate North and Exit 3A - Queensgate South. WA-240 West leaves the I-182/US-12 freeway here.

item.title: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West - Exit 4
item.description: I-182/US-12/WA-240 West approaching Exit 4 - WA-240 West/Wellsian Way/Vantage. Continue west on I-182 for I-82 to Yakima and Pendleton (Oregon).

item.title: WA-240 West at I-182 and George Washington Way
item.description: WA-240 West at I-182 and George Washington Way in Richland. Use right lane for I-182 East to Richland; and I-182 West/WA-240 West to Yakima. Continue straight for George Washington Way.

item.title: WA-240 West Approaching I-182 and George Washington Way
item.description: WA-240 West Approaching I-182 and George Washington Way in Richland. Use right lanes for I-182 and to continue west on WA-240. WA-240 joins I-182 west briefly.

item.title: WA-240 West - Columbia Park Trail
item.description: WA-240 West at Columbia Park Trail interchange.

item.title: Columbia Center Blvd. North at WA-240
item.description: Columbia Center Blvd. North at WA-240. Use WA-240 west to Richland; WA-240 east to Kennewick.

item.title: WA-240 West - Columbia Center Blvd.
item.description: WA-240 west approaching Columbia Center Blvd. interchange.

item.title: WA-240 West - Edison St.
item.description: WA-240 West at Edison St. interchange.

item.title: WA-240 West - Columbia Park
item.description: WA-240 west at Columbia Park interchange.

item.title: US-395 North on WA-240 Offramp
item.description: US-395 on WA-240 offramp approaching roundabout. Use right lane for Columbia Drive. Use any lane for WA-240 west to Richland.

item.title: US-395 North at WA-240 West
item.description: US-395 North at WA-240 West to Richland. Continue north on US-395 for Pasco. The next three exits are Lewis St., Sylvester St., and Court St. (all in Pasco).

item.title: US-395 North Approaching WA-240
item.description: US-395 North Approaching WA-240 West to Richland. Continue north on US-395 for Pasco.

item.title: US-395 North - Kennewick
item.description: US-395 north Kennewick near beginning of freeway. Use left lane to continue north on US-395.

item.title: US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 north. Distance to Kennewick and Pasco.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 113
item.description: I-82 west at Exit 113 - US-395 North/Jct I-182/Kennewick/Pasco. US-395 leaves I-82 westbound.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 113
item.description: I-82 west approaching Exit 113. Use US-395 north for Spokane and Walla Walla.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 113
item.description: I-82 west approaching Exit 113 - US-395 North/To I-182/Kennewick/Pasco. US-395 leaves I-82 westbound here.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-82 west approaching Exit 114 - WA-397 North/Finley. This exit was formerly called Locust Grove Road.

item.title: I-82 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-82 west. Distance to Kennewick, Pasco, and Richland (the Tri-Cities). This is the first distance marker on I-82 westbound in Washington.

item.title: End WA-240 West at WA-24
item.description: End WA-240 west at WA-24. Use WA-24 West to Yakima; WA-24 east to Othello and Vantage.

item.title: WA-240 West Approaching WA-24
item.description: WA-240 West approaching WA-24 to Othello and Yakima.

item.title: WA-240 West at WA-225 South
item.description: WA-240 West at WA-225 South to Benton City. Continue west on WA-240 for Vantage.

item.title: WA-240 West Approaching WA-225
item.description: WA-240 West approaching WA-225 south to Benton City.

item.title: WA-240 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on WA-240 west. Distance to Yakima and Vantage.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 1 (Oregon)
item.description: I-82 east on the Columbia River bridge approaching Oregon Exit 1, To US-395/US-730/Hermiston/Umatilla.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 131
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 131 - WA-14 West/Plymouth/Vancouver. This is the last Washington exit on I-82.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 122
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 122 - Coffin Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 114
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 114 - Locust Grove Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 114
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 114 - Locust Grove Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 113
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 113 - US-395 North/To I-182/Kennewick/Spokane. US-395 joins I-82 from here to Umatilla, OR.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 109
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 109 - Badger Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 104
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 104 - Dallas Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 102
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 102 - I-182/US-12 East/Richland/Pasco. Overhead for I-82 East to Umatilla and Pendleton. US-12 joins I-82 from here to Yakima.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 102
item.description: I-82 west approaching Exit 102. Use Exit 102 for Spokane and Walla Walla.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 102 - To WA-240
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 102. Use Exit 102 for WA-240/Vantage/Kennewick.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 102
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 102 - I-182/US-12 East/Richland/Pasco.

item.title: I-82 East - Kennewick Exits
item.description: Kennewick Exits on I-82 east.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 96
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 96 - WA-224 East/WA-225 North/W. Richland/Benton City.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 93
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 93 - Yakitat Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 88
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 88 - Gibbon Road.

item.title: Begin of WA-22 East at I-82
item.description: WA-22 west at I-82 east to Richland.

item.title: Begin of WA-22 West Approaching I-82
item.description: WA-22 west at I-82 onramp.

item.title: End WA-22 East at I-82 West
item.description: End WA-22 east at I-82. I-82 West onramp to Grandview and Yakima.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 82
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 82 - WA-22/To WA-221/Mabton/Patterson.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 82
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 82 - WA-22/WA-221/Mabton/Patterson.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 80
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 80 - Gap Road/Prosser.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 80
item.description: I-82 east approaching Exit 80 - Gap Road.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 131
item.description: I-82 west at Exit 131 - WA-14 West/Plymouth/Vancouver. WA-14 parallels I-84 on the Washington side of the Columbia River.

item.title: End WA-14 East at I-82
item.description: End WA-14 east at I-82 to Umatilla and Kennewick.

item.title: I-82 East Exit 1 (Oregon)
item.description: I-82 east on the Columbia River bridge approaching Oregon Exit 1, To US-395/US-730/Hermiston/Umatilla.

item.title: WA-14 East at WA-221 North
item.description: WA-14 east approaching WA-221 north to Prosser.

item.title: Begin WA-14 at I-82 (Exit 131)
item.description: Begin WA-14 at I-82 (Exit 131). Use I-82 west to Kennewick and Yakima. Use I-82 east to Umatilla (Oregon).
